item.title: Google Home Mini
item.dc:creator: AditiPawaskar
item.description: Whether it is to get answers from Google, controlling your home entertainment, or viewing your day’s schedule – the compact Google Home Mini acts as your personal assistant and makes your life easier. All you have to do is say “Ok Google” and the built-in Google Assistant is ready to be of service to you.
item.content:encoded: Whether it is to get answers from Google, controlling your home entertainment, or viewing your day’s schedule – the compact Google Home Mini acts as your personal assistant and makes your life easier. All you have to do is say “Ok Google” and the built-in Google Assistant is ready to be of service to you.

item.title: Amazon Echo
item.dc:creator: AditiPawaskar
item.description:
Amazon Echo is a hands-free smart speaker that you control using your voice. It connects to Alexa – a cloud based voice service to play music, make calls, check weather and news, set alarms, control smart home devices, and much more. Echo has powerful speakers that fill the room with immersive 360° omnidirectional audio, and deliver …

Amazon EchoRead More »
item.content:encoded: Amazon Echo is a hands-free smart speaker that you control using your voice. It connects to Alexa – a cloud based voice service to play music, make calls, check weather and news, set alarms, control smart home devices, and much more. Echo has powerful speakers that fill the room with immersive 360° omnidirectional audio, and deliver crisp vocals and dynamic bass response.

item.title: Google Home
item.dc:creator: AditiPawaskar
item.description:
Google Home speakers enable users to speak voice commands to interact with services through Google’s intelligent personal assistant called Google Assistant. A large number of services, both in-house and third-party, are integrated, allowing users to listen to music, control playback of videos or photos, or receive news updates entirely by voice. Google Home devices also …

Google HomeRead More »
item.content:encoded: Google Home speakers enable users to speak voice commands to interact with services through Google’s intelligent personal assistant called Google Assistant. A large number of services, both in-house and third-party, are integrated, allowing users to listen to music, control playback of videos or photos, or receive news updates entirely by voice. Google Home devices also have integrated support for home automation, letting users control smart home appliances with their voice. Multiple Google Home devices can be placed in different rooms in a home for synchronized playback of music.
